fields.fieldTitle: Topic of the product in 2-3 words

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Get Your House Sold

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 thing they want to know how to do in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: Starts with a VERB
Ex: The odds are almost 100 to 1 against you selling your house without an agent
Ex: Most people will never sell their house without an Agent
Ex: You don't have access to pricing data
Ex: You don't have access to pricing data
Ex: You don't have access to pricing data

fields.fieldTitle: Why is the problem worse than they think?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: The good buyers all work with agents because they don't have to pay commission

fields.fieldTitle: Why is it even worse than that?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: The best buyers work with agents exclusively, leaving you the dregs

fields.fieldTitle: And what makes this worst of all?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: The people who do come look at your house either want to steal it from you, or their credit sucks and they can't get a loan

fields.fieldTitle: What is the name of your solution?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Selling Your Home Alone

fields.fieldTitle: Format of your solution / product / service?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: home study course, software, coaching, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What's a big benefit they want?

fieldHint.hint1: Should start with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Sell your house without an agent and save the commission

fields.fieldTitle: What's another big benefit they want?

fieldHint.hint1: Should start with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Negotiate the best price, terms and conditions

fields.fieldTitle: What's even another big benefit they want?

fieldHint.hint1: Should start with a VERB

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Receive a fair price for your house no matter what the market is doing

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Discover exactly how to price your home for maximum profit

fieldHint.hint2: Use the Brunson Bullets Script OR the FBM Bullet Scripts to come up with bullets

Ex: Take a look at these testimonials

Ex: Technology is making it easier than ever to sell your home, IF you know how to use the tools
Ex: The same principals that work for real estate agents can work for you, if you know what they are and how to use them. Here are the Step-By-Step instructions on how to get your house SOLD!
Ex: Step By Step instructions on how to get your house ready to sell, no matter what the market is doing
Ex: How to price your home right and then get the price you're asking for
Ex: How to deal with real estate agents, buyers, lenders, attornies and title companies to get your sale through closing
Ex: My personal checklist of 25 things to do to get your house under contract for the highest price in the least time
Ex: Everything you need to get started selling your home this weekend!
